HOME[Covinil](https://www.covinil.com/en/author/produccion2/ "Posts by Covinil")2021-06-30T14:49:18+00:00

Complejos de Vinyl SA (Covinil SA) is a Spanish company founded in 1975, and we are dedicated to the manufacture of PET, UPVC (polyvinyl chloride without plasticizer) and CPP films for the food packaging industry.

At Covinil we design and transform our products from the raw materials into the final product. We complete the process entirely in our facilities thanks to our specialized technology in film extrusion, printing and metallization.

###### EXTRUSION

UPVC Extrusion

PP Cast Extrusion

BOPET Extrusion

###### METALLIZATION

Decorative metallization

Partial band metallization

High barrier metallization

AlOx metallization

###### PRINTING

Gravure printing

1 to 9 color printing

###### LAMINATION

Lamination and online printing

###### SLITTING

Latest generation slitting machines

Cut from 30 mm to 1650 mm

These films are marketed throughout the world under the trademark CECRONIL ®.

In addition to extrusion plants (PET, UPVC and CPP), Covinil has facilities for gravure printing, metallization (total, strip and AlOx), embossing and laminating.

These films are used for the manufacture of different types of flexible packaging, and we specialise in films for wrapping candy, lidding for trays and Christmas decoration items.

- ![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Bandeja3.jpg)

- ![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Bandeja4.jpg)

- ![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Bandeja1.jpg)

- ![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Bandeja2.jpg)


### Location

C/Rienda, 4

Polígono Industrial El Palomo

28946 Fuenlabrada (Madrid)

Spain

[covinilsa@covinil.com](mailto:covinilsa@covinil.com)

Tel: +34 916909313

Fax: +34 916978767

[MAP](https://www.covinil.com/en/home/#)

## DO YOU WANT TO EXPAND THIS INFORMATION?

Consult our commercial team.

[Contact](https://www.covinil.com/contact/)

#### **Emissions reduction**

[![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/renovable-logo.png)](https://www.covinil.com/certificados/energia.pdf)

Covinil has adopted a Sustainability Management System by which 1.500 MWh of renewable origin energy has been utilised in 2023, helping us to reduce our carbon footprint.

#### **Carbon footprint**

[![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/huella_carbono-3.jpg)](https://www.covinil.com/certificados/energia.pdf)

Covinil monitors its Carbon footprint annually using the Carbon footprint register from the Ministry of Ecological Transition, to meet its objectives of reducing its emissions continually every year

#### **Cecronil products with PCR content**

[![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/reciclado-logo.png)](https://www.covinil.com/certificados/reciclado.pdf)

Covinil offers their Cecronil PET range of products with a minimum recycled content (Post Consumer recycled) of 30%.

#### **Operation Clean Sweep (OCS)**

[![](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/OCS-3.png)](https://www.covinil.com/certificados/reciclado.pdf)

Covinil takes part in the voluntary programme “Operation Clean Sweep” which aims to manage and prevent pellet loss to help protect the environment.

© 2024 COVINIL S.A. \| C/Rienda 4 \| Polígono Industrial El Palomo \| Fuenlabrada 28946 – Madrid – Spain

[Web Design](https://www.improntadigital.com/) \| [Legal Notice](https://www.covinil.com/aviso-legal/) \| [Privacy Policy](https://www.covinil.com/politica-de-privacidad/) \| [Cookies Policy](https://www.covinil.com/politica-de-cookies/)

[Sustainability Management System Policy](https://www.covinil.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Anexo-III_Politica-del-SGS_-ed01_140623.pdf)

COVINIL uses its own and third-party cookies that allow us to improve browsing usability and collect information. Cookies will not be used to collect personal information.

Cookies not essential for navigation will only be installed if you accept this feature.

You will find more information in our [Cookies Policy](https://www.covinil.com/es/cookies/)

SettingsUNDERSTANDREJECT [More](https://www.covinil.com/es/politica-de-cookies/)

Privacy & Cookies Policy

Close

#### Cookies Policy

This website uses cookies to improve your experience while browsing the website. Of these cookies, the cookies that are classified as necessary are stored in your browser, as they are essential for the functioning of the basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to unsubscribe from these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience.

Necessary

Necessary

Always Enabled

Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that guarantee basic functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not store any personal information.

Non-necessary

Non-necessary

Cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and are specifically used to collect personal data from the user through analysis, advertisements and other embedded content are called non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory to obtain the user's consent before executing these cookies on your website.

SAVE & ACCEPT
